greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Analog of A084848, replacing "quadratic residue" (X^2) with "value of X(3X-1)/2". a(n) = A290732(A290729(n)).
link: Hugo Pfoertner, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..182
Andreas Enge, William Hart, Fredrik Johansson, Short addition sequences for theta functions, arXiv:1608.06810 [math.NT], 2016-2018. See Table 6.
mathematica: r = 2; Reap[For[j = 1, j <= 24001, j = j+1, w = a290732[j]; t = w/j; If[t < r, r = t; Sow[w]]]][[2, 1]] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Oct 03 2018, after _Hugo Pfoertner_ *)
results.author: _N. J. A. Sloane_, Aug 10 2017
ext: a(1), a(19) and a(38) corrected by _Hugo Pfoertner_, Aug 26 2018
